description: It's about 20 years now since I started learning computer graphics, and I have done everything from creating digital environments, hard surface modeling, look development to today, where I create 3D motion design, TV commercials and NFTs. My career had lots of different aspects. An environment I created for a short film won the Award of Excellence on 3dtotal.com back in 2014. As I learned and progressed, I took on the responsibilities of a CG creative director. I was nominated and awarded winner
